title: The "Vaibhavam" Jhumka: Emerald & Pearl Cascade
materials: and Freshwater Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: Classic South Indian Jhumka design featuring a domed structure intricately adorned with CZ stones. Delicate lattice work creates a regal appearance. Cascade of lustrous freshwater pearls enhances the earring's beauty, adding a touch of elegance. The design is a modern adaptation of traditional Temple Jewellery. The top features filigree with a center emerald.
colors: Predominantly gold with sparkling clear CZ stones
accented by a vibrant green emerald and creamy white pearls.
occasions: and other festive occasions. These earrings also make a statement for grand parties and celebrations.
description: These Jhumkas combine traditional South Indian design with modern elegance, making them versatile for various occasions. The use of high-quality CZ stones ensures a brilliant sparkle, while the genuine freshwater pearls add a touch of luxury. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability. The cascade of pearls gives this piece the 'Vaibhavam' (Grandeur) of traditional South Indian jewelry. The emerald center gives it an elegant touch.
